programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: Greg, an introvert child, struggles to deal with his family and his school, and suffers from his classmates. He decides to write about his experiences in a newspaper.(n)

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: After the 60-minute war, the survived cities thrive to stay on the now unfertile Earth. The strong survivors then decide to go to the smaller ones using huge bikes to take their resources.(n)

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: During a trip to Japan to see a dying friend, Logan is forced to come to grips with his own powers and near-immortality as he is drawn into a confrontation with gangsters and ninjas that reveals a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: When the Avengers raid a Hydra facility in Eastern European Sokovia and confiscate Loki's scepter from its commander, Tony Stark uses the scepter's gem to completeplete "Ultron", a global defense program. Ultron gains artificial ingelligence from the gem and believes he must eradicate humanity to save Earth. The Avengers must face evolving Ultron, his robot army and the Scarlet Witch to save humanity.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Torn between his allegiance to two different worlds, Hellboy struggles with the fact that accepting his real heritage might lead to an apocalypse, all while resisting the machinations of a witch intent on destroying the world.(n)

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Baby Doll is detained in the mental hospital by her step-father. During an operation, she gets into a fantasy world in her head, where she attempts to escape her prison with four other girls and faces strange creatures.(n)

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mia, an ambitious actress, who serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as their success rises they are faced with decisions that begin to affect the fragile fabric of their love relationship, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other are started to threaten to rip them apart.(n)

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A small loving family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.(n)

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Emily arrives in Miami, with big dreams of becoming a professional dancer. She meets Sean, who leads a dancing crew. They discover that Emily's father, a wealthy businessman, plans to demolish the neighborhood as part of a development plan, and she has to stand up against her father in order to protect their neighborhood, all expressed through their dancing.(n)

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: Bianca is a content high school senior whose world is shattered as she learns the student body knows her as 'The DUFF'. Despite the words of caution from her favorite teacher, she puts aside the potential distraction of her crush, Toby, and enlists Wesley, a charming jock, to help reinvent herself.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: When the Avengers raid a Hydra facility in Eastern European Sokovia and confiscate Loki's scepter from its commander, Tony Stark uses the scepter's gem to completeplete "Ultron", a global defense program. Ultron gains artificial ingelligence from the gem and believes he must eradicate humanity to save Earth. The Avengers must face evolving Ultron, his robot army and the Scarlet Witch to save humanity.(n)

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: During a trip to Japan to see a dying friend, Logan is forced to come to grips with his own powers and near-immortality as he is drawn into a confrontation with gangsters and ninjas that reveals a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Casino Jack
programme.desc: This upcoming title is a film about the career of Washington lobbyist and convicted con man Jack Abramoff. In an investigation following a corruption scandal, Jack Abramoff was convicted of several charges including fraud and tax evasion. Several other Washington lobbyists and politicians were also convicted. The film stars Kevin Spacey as Jack Abramoff and Kelly Preston as Jack’s wife Pam.(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: When an unremarkable ghostwriter is hired to finish the memoirs of the former Prime Minister, what appears like the opportunity of a lifetime has him walking a tightrope as he stumbles across clues that his predecessor may have been killed when he learned of the minister's treasonous secret.(n)

programme.title: Miss Sloane
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist finds herself in the fight of her life when she puts her strategic talents into trying to push for legislation to control guns. But as the powerful gun lobby rises up against her, she discovers that she is going against people who are willing to go to any lengths to stop her.(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: The story of the founders of the news-leaking website WikiLeaks, Julian Assange and Daniel Domscheit-Berg, and the conflicts that arise between them after establishing one of the most controversial organizations in the world, and the constant quest by major world forces to hunt it down.(n)

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: Jim Bennett is a literature professor who's suffering from a gambling addiction, which gets him in muddy waters with a group of gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: When the Avengers raid a Hydra facility in Eastern European Sokovia and confiscate Loki's scepter from its commander, Tony Stark uses the scepter's gem to completeplete "Ultron", a global defense program. Ultron gains artificial ingelligence from the gem and believes he must eradicate humanity to save Earth. The Avengers must face evolving Ultron, his robot army and the Scarlet Witch to save humanity.(n)

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: After the 60-minute war, the survived cities thrive to stay on the now unfertile Earth. The strong survivors then decide to go to the smaller ones using huge bikes to take their resources.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: The movie shows the relationship between children’s author A.A. Milne and his son Christopher C.R. Milne, whose toys inspired the magical world of Winnie the Pooh.(n)

programme.title: Their Finest
programme.desc: The Welsh writer Catrin (Gemma Arterton), works for the Department of Cinema in the Ministry of Information during World War II, and seeks with the rest of her colleagues to make a political propaganda film, after a breath-taking conflict by the Axis forces.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
programme.desc: Putting a twist on the old fairytale, "Hansel & Gretel" brings us the siblings as grown up bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the Blood Moon approaches, the pair encounter a new evil that might hold a secret to their past.(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.desc: After a harrowing journey through the Misty Mountains, during which Bilbo acquires the One Ring, the beloved hobbit, Gandalf, and the dwarves continue on their quest to confront the dragon Smaug and reclaim their gold.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.(n)

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: The night after Romulus Augustus is crowned, barbarian general Odoacer leads a coup to seize control of the Western Roman Empire. Forced to flee, young Romulus and his loyal companions make their way to Britannia to find the last loyal legion so they can take back the throne.(n)

programme.title: Their Finest
programme.desc: The Welsh writer Catrin (Gemma Arterton), works for the Department of Cinema in the Ministry of Information during World War II, and seeks with the rest of her colleagues to make a political propaganda film, after a breath-taking conflict by the Axis forces.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: The movie shows the relationship between children’s author A.A. Milne and his son Christopher C.R. Milne, whose toys inspired the magical world of Winnie the Pooh.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.(n)

programme.title: JFK
programme.desc: District Attorney Jim Garrison tries to get to the bottom of who really killed John F. Kennedy. Growing suspicious of the official story, he assembles a team to pursue different scenarios, only to be attacked from all sides as the government and various politicians try to bury the investigation.(n)

programme.title: Chappaquiddick
programme.desc: Based on the true events of Ted Kennedy’s involvement of a fatal accident who claimed the life of the young campaign coordinator Mary Jo Kopechne, and how it affected not only his political career, but his entire life.(n)

programme.title: Official Secrets
programme.desc: In the run-up to the invasion of Iraq, British Intelligence whistle-blower Katharine Gun leaked a memo about a joint spying between the US and UK, proposing to blackmail smaller member states to vote for the war in Iraq. Journalist Martin Bright published that document in The Observer newspaper and the Security Council was outraged.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Born with oversized ears that garner him a lot of mockery, it's soon discovered that the young elephant Dumbo can fly, which makes him the main attraction for his struggling circus. But when he is recruited for an entertainment park, Dumbo comes to realize the dark secrets of the so-called Dreamland.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline

programme.desc: A team of space explorers embark on a voyage to explore a newly discovered wormhole that would theoretically allow them to travel through time and space and save humanity from extinction.(n)

programme.desc: As a man heads to outer space to prevent a climate-controlled satellite network from triggering a devastating storm that has protected the planet from many natural disasters for three years, his brother tries to kidnap the US president to force him to resolve the crisis.(n)

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: A clairvoyant magician is pursued by a counter-terrorism agent who wants him to use his ability to prevent a nuclear disaster. As his gift limits him to only seeing two minutes into the future, Cris is forced to flee with both the FBI and the terrorist close on his tail.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: An overworked paramedic begins to hallucinate over a three-night shift. As he is haunted by the ghosts of those he failed to save, he must fight to hold onto his sanity.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Ricky, a corrupt cop with the dream of becoming mayor, finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at a major boxing event. He tries to uncover the shocking murder plot, which becomes more shocking upon knowing its mastermind.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: A reckoning arrives for a police officer known for his ghastly ideals and hateful ways, as he is caught on tape brutally beating a guy. As his police department faces heat for letting him run amok, he struggles to tell friend from foe as he tries to defend his "right" to hate indiscriminately.(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner teams up with his ex-con friend Roman Pearce and undercover U.S. Customs Service agent Monica Fuentes to bring down Miami's drug lord Carter Verone.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie (Wahlberg), Stella (Theron) and their carefully selected team, plan a gold bar heist against their former ally-turned-enemy, Steve.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) faces the consequences of his choices as a superhero and a father; as he struggles to re-balance his domestic life while assuming his responsibilities as Ant-Man. He’s also confronted by Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) and Dr. Hank Pym (Michael Douglas) with an urgent new mission.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala despite the age gap. The Republic is mired in chaos and it is discovered that there is a secret clone army posing a threat to the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: The story offers original tale that have been said about the bitter conflict between humans and Orcs, addressing through the events the conflict occurred between the two sides.(n)

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: A look into the backstory of Logan, focusing on his relationship with his brother Victor, the duo's recruitment by William Stryker, and Logan's departure from the mutant mercenary squad. As he tries to live a normal life with his girlfriend, Logan's past comes calling and puts his life on the line.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: The Irish lady, Deirdre, forms a team of specialized mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase from dangerous criminals. After they successfully complete the mission, the suitcase gets switched by a member of the team who wants to sell it to the Russians.(n)

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: After years of being banned by the US Secret Service from accessing computers until he reaches the age of 18, a hacker and his pals uncover a conspiracy to unleash a devastating computer virus while being hunted by the Secret Service and the wicked computer genius behind this malware.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: The story offers original tale that have been said about the bitter conflict between humans and Orcs, addressing through the events the conflict occurred between the two sides.(n)

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

As he tries to live a normal life with his girlfriend, Logan's past comes calling and puts his life on the line.(n)

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: After Mr. X steals DM85, a deadly biological weapon, and its antidote, he arranges to sell it to billionaire, Liam Wonder. During their meeting, extreme sports player, Zhao Feng, accidentally parachutes into Bruce and the four rookies room and gets involved with them.(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: In 1963, friends with supernatural powers (Charles Xavier) and (Erik Lensherr), known as Prof. X and Magento, worked together to find all individuals with supernatural abilities but the two sides soon split, splitting their followers into two warring teams.(n)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.(n)

programme.title: Tremors: Shrieker Island
programme.desc: When a hunting party head to Dark Island to hunt down Graboids, things take a terrifying turn when they find themselves being hunted by genetically modified Graboids and the increasingly multiplying Shriekers.(n)

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.(n)

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: When the journalist Jania meets the falconer Ivan for an interview, he accompanies her to meet his estranged mother the faith healer Nana Kunning, who abandoned him years ago after a tragic accident.(n)

programme.title: A Vigilante
programme.desc: A female vigilante helps victims avenge themselves on their domestic abusers through learning martial arts, boxing, among other survival skills as she makes it her mission to help those who cannot escape their violent spouses.(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.(n)

programme.desc: Secret CIA agent Jack Ryan (Chris Pine) discovers a Russian conspiracy of a terrorist attack intended to collapse the US economy and hit Wall Street. Jack takes the task of protecting his country even if it costs him his life.(n)

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: Aidan Bloom is a 35-year-old struggling actor, who's still trying to figure out who he is. But when he can't pay for his kids' private school, he ends up teaching them himself, and along the way, he learns new things about himself.(n)

programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.(n)

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: Set in the time of World War II and the time of Churchill being Prime Minister of the UK, the movie tells the story of the 96 hours before the invasion of Normandy.(n)

programme.title: Journey’s End
programme.desc: During WWII, nerves fray as a company awaits an upcoming German attack that they desperately try to avoid thinking about, as their leader, Captain Stanhope, crumbles under the pressure and horror of war.(n)

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: In 1964, racism continues to cast a shadow over America. Three civil rights defenders disappear in Mississippi. Two FBI agents go to the town to look into this mysterious case. Robert Anderson, worked in the region before joining the FBI, is well aware of the nature of the place, so he does not mind bending rules to achieve his goal. Events escalate and attacks on black citizens begin.(n)

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: When World War II ends, soldier Freddie goes home, looking for a new start. Somehow, things get rocky when he comes across a cult that is looking for new members.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Rubin Carter is a middleweight boxer who managed to escape the tragedies and sufferings of his childhood. He is hopeful about the future, but his hopes are thwarted when he is accused of murder and imprisoned.(n)

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: The documentary revolves around the iconic boxing champion Muhammad Ali, as it depicts his rise from a poor boy to being a worldwide legend and becoming an influential social activist in his community after retirement.(n)

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.(n)

programme.title: Henry's Crime
programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.(n)

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: The documentary revolves around the iconic boxing champion Muhammad Ali, as it depicts his rise from a poor boy to being a worldwide legend and becoming an influential social activist in his community after retirement.(n)

programme.title: All Creatures Here Below
programme.desc: After running into trouble, the struggling young couple Gensan and Ruby seek refuge in their hometown of Kansas City, where they're faced with dark secrets from the past.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: The story follows the journey of the ambitious boxer Midge Kelly from his humble beginnings until his rise to fame, as he stops at nothing to get what he wants.(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place.(n)

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.(n)

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: Jim Bennett is a literature professor who's suffering from a gambling addiction, which gets him in muddy waters with a group of gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: When he is sent on a debt-collecting mission in Hollywood, the gangster Chili Palmer gets a surprising offer to join the entertainment industry. He soon discovers that the world of Hollywood has its similarities to the world of mobsters.(n)

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: The documentary revolves around the iconic boxing champion Muhammad Ali, as it depicts his rise from a poor boy to being a worldwide legend and becoming an influential social activist in his community after retirement.(n)

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.(n)

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the American Civil War; a mysterious gunslinger reluctantly joins a Mexican desperado to find a buried treasure, while they seek to get the better of an outlaw who's trying to beat them to the money.(n)

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman, an employee of the insurance company, lives a normal life, in which the same situations are repeated on a daily basis. Despite his quiet life with his beautiful wife, Truman always feels something is missing. Truman wants to travel and roam the world, but obstacles always stand in his way. Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Shy student Todd Anderson attends the school where his older brother was famous along with his roommate Neil Perry. They meet John Keating, the new English teacher who creates a club called The Dead Poets Society,through which he tries to help his students restore balance in their lives.(n)

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: Pat Solitano, a hothead with bipolar disorder, is fresh out of a mental institution and has to move back home with his parents. His plans for getting his life back on track get derailed when he meets the equally eccentric and neurotic Tiffany.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Don Vito Corleone,the head of one of the five mafia families in New York, doesn't want his younger son Michael to get involved in the life of organized crime. Michael feels the same, but things change when negotiations fail between the family of Don Corleone and other families about the distribution of drugs.(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: After he survives an assassination attempt in Sweden, the contract killer Jack flees to Rome where he is hired to build a custom sniper rifle for a client, as he vows that this will be his last job.(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: An engaged couple, Van and Barbara, decide it's time for their future-in-laws to meet up, prompting Val's gay father to hide his sexuality and put a false straight front to appeal to Barbara's moralistic, republican parents.(n)

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.(n)

programme.title: Between Waves
programme.desc: Rick Gray returns to his coastal hometown, hoping that a return to his roots will help to reinvigorate him and combat his midlife crisis. As he reconnects with the friends of his youth, he embarks on a journey that will see him reevaluate his life and confront his choices.(n)

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.(n)

programme.title: The Hummingbird Project
programme.desc: Vincent (Jesse Eisenberg) and Anton (Alexander Skarsgård) are two cousins from New York, and players in the high-stakes game of High- Frequency Trading, where winning is measured by milliseconds. They go head to head against their former boss, Torres (Salma Hayek), in a deal to build a straight fiber-optic cable line that could make them millionaires.(n)

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
programme.desc: In the town of Snow Hollow, Officer John Marshall is skeptical about the existence of werewolves, that is until mutilated bodies start turning up every full moon.(n)

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.(n)

programme.title: Cheerleader Abduction
programme.desc: Olivia is a bright student and head of her school's cheerleading team who's harboring a scandalous secret. As Olivia starts pulling away from her mother, the latter grows concerned and sets about trying to get to the bottom of the matter, uncovering a shocking truth.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.(n)

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.(n)

programme.title: Winter's Dream
programme.desc: Years after she quit skiing competitively, Kat is asked by a young competitive racer to coach her and hone her skills. Little does she know that the professional opportunity will also bring her love in the form of the racer's widowed father, Ty.(n)

programme.title: Love Struck Café
programme.desc: When she returns to her hometown for a business opportunity that involves a complicated confrontation with a childhood friend, Megan gets more than she reckoned for when her father breaks his leg and she starts helping at his cafe. Then an old flame shows up and everything spins out of control.(n)

programme.title: Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
programme.desc: Police Chief Lassiter is ambushed and left for dead, after which Shawn and Gus leave San Francisco to help him, only to find themselves unwelcome in Santa Barbara as they contemplate a scheme to unravel a case about the supernatural.(n)

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.(n)

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.(n)

programme.title: Hooking Up
programme.desc: After Bailey, a cancer patient, and Darla, a recovering sex addict, cross paths, they decide to go on a road trip together, each with their ulterior motives.(n)

programme.title: Love to the Rescue
programme.desc: Two single parents find love in the most unexpected place: a school pet adoption function. With both Kate and Eric vying to adopt the same dog, they end up agreeing to share custody of the rescue dog, a notion that ends up bringing them closer than they ever expected.(n)

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.(n)

programme.title: Love, Take Two
programme.desc: Lily, a television producer, is in for a surprise when her new reality show takes her to her college town. Tasked with filming three couples plan their wedding, life throws her a curveball when she discovers that one of the grooms is her ex-boyfriend, and that their chemistry is just as lit as ever.(n)

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.(n)

programme.title: Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: The film follows the story of three characters, a drug dealer, an architect and a university professor, who are brought together on a journey that is connected with a drug company that is producing a painkiller that is non-addictive.(n)

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Bodyguard Michael Bryce finds himself embroiled in a new dangerous mission, as he teams up with hitman Darius Kincaid and his wife Sonia in order to thwart a cyberattack in Europe.(n)

programme.title: Monster Party
programme.desc: As three thieves plot to infiltrate a party for a daring heist, it soon unfolds that the guests are anything but innocent, and now they have to fight for their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Tax Collector
programme.desc: David and Creeper work for the mob boss Wizard, who exploits the duo to collect money and profits from local gang leaders. However, when Wizard's nemesis arrives from Mexico, David and his family find themselves in danger.(n)

programme.title: Love, of Course

programme.desc: As Joe Croaker and Cosmo embark on many escapades with their friends at the marsh where they all live, they learn to be better friends as their antics bring them closer.(n)

programme.title: The Wish Fish
programme.desc: Opil is an 8-year-old boy who detests the dish called 'The Wish Fish' that his mother makes. Resentful of the meal, he wishes that aliens invade the planet and all the fish will vanish. When the wish comes true, a group of villains appears, and Opil starts to realize what he has done.(n)

programme.title: Bamse and the Thief City
programme.desc: The most popular Swedish comic book character gets his first feature film. The world's strongest bear Bamse and his friends Little Hopp and Shellman prove that friendship is the best weapon against evil.(n)

programme.desc: The series follows the characters living in Sprookjesbos, or Fairy Tale Forest, like Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, and Tom Thumb, with each story having a moral message.(n)

programme.desc: Nur and her parents move to China, where she makes new friends. While they're celebrating Guo's birthday in an amusement park, they discover that their friend is missing and they have to cross a maze and go through the nine gates of the dragon to find him.(n)

War doesn't end when one goes home. After being discharged from the marines, Nelson Sanchez's homecoming brings with it a reckoning as he is forced to finally confront the violent past that he has been trying to forget.(n)

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: William is a brave squire, whose master dies, and he decides to continue his legacy with his friends, Roland and Watt, by his side. During their journey they meet an aspiring writer, who William convinces to forge a document proving that he's a knight. Thus, his journey as a knight begins, in several different towns.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: The captain of the Silk Road Protection Squad, Huo An, reunites with elite defected Roman troops to prevent the merciless Roman leader, Tiberius, from conquering the Silk Road with his army.(n)

programme.title: Two Graves
programme.desc: In the wake of her son's murder, a doctor teams up with a drug addict to capture the young man whom she believes is responsible for her recent loss. But as she tries to force a confession out of him through torture, hidden secrets come to the surface as tragedy strikes again.(n)

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Jack Carter, who left his home in Seattle years ago and moved to Las Vegas, returned to the funeral of his brother Richard after his death in a road accident during a storm. He suspects that he was killed and is after the killers.(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.(n)

programme.title: The Super
programme.desc: When a former cop becomes the superintendent of an upscale building in New York, he is quick to start investigating the mysterious disappearances that take place in the building. Narrowing his suspect pool down to one man, he must race to uncover the truth as his own daughters land in peril.(n)

programme.title: Man of the House
programme.desc: A comedy about a cheer-leading group at the University of Texas who witness a drug-related murder and a policeman (Roland Sharp) is assigned to protecting their lives until the trial. Roland hides his identity and acts as a coach and finds himself in a new atmosphere , which he knows nothing about.(n)

programme.title: Acts of Violence
programme.desc: When his fiancee is kidnapped by human traffickers, Roman (Ashton Holmes) and his ex-military brothers set out to track her down and save her before it is too late. Along the way, Roman teams up with Avery (Bruce Willis), a cop investigating human trafficking and fighting the corrupted bureaucracy.(n)

programme.title: Malevolent
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves in a tight spot when their pretense of being paranormal experts for money leads them to a haunted house, only to discover that the evil lurking inside is all too real.(n)

programme.title: The Art of War
programme.desc: Shaw is a secret agent working for the United Nations to keep things peaceful and cooperative. A boat of murdered Vietnamese refugees arrives at an American beach, and an assassination attempt targets the ambassador of China during the signing of an American-Chinese agreement. Shaw gets unwillingly involved in the crime, and starts to look for the true criminal to remove suspicions from himself.(n)

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: When Secret Service Agent Pete Garrison becomes the victim of a plot that frames him for an assassination attempt on the president, he finds himself working outside the law to prove his innocence, while trying to evade one of his own mentees who is trying to arrest him.(n)

programme.title: The Remains
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family moves to an old Victorian home, unaware that a chest in their attic has antiques possessed by an evil spirit that soon possesses each family member as it grows stronger and nearly achieves its malevolent goal: to kidnap the children.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: After Dwayne and Travis failed to get the money to open a massage parlor, they kidnap a pizza delivery man and make him wear a vest with time bomb, and force him to steal the $ 100,000 needed to finance their project within 10 hours.(n)

programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.(n)

programme.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
programme.desc: This unique picture adopts medieval Persia as its setting. Dastan the prince joins forces with princess Tamina in an effort to confront an evil tyrant that seeks to acquire possession of a magical dagger. Whoever holds the curious artifact gains mastery over the realms of sand and time.(n)

programme.desc: The third movie in Robert Rodriguez's "Mariachi" trilogy, where hitman "El Mariachi" is caught in an international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.(n)

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: With his mother in a coma, young Harper believes his stepfather to be the one behind it, prompting him to enter a pact with a hooligan to exact revenge on his stepfather.(n)

programme.desc: Special forces soldier John falls in love with Savannah at first sight, while on vacation in his hometown. They both know that John will be back in the military in the future, and the September 11th attacks cause him to go back soon. Things then get complicated between them and their relationship almost reaches breaking point. Is their love strong enough to survive.(n)

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: In the Montana wilderness, estranged father and son, David and Carl, struggle to connect as they go on a hunting trip. But the trip soon takes a dangerous turn when they encounter a bear, leaving them both injured and fighting for their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Rider
programme.desc: After suffering a serious head injury that almost killed him, a young cowboy pledges to find his new identity, trying to discover what it means to be a man living in the heart of America.(n)

programme.desc: As the fame of sisters Laura and Kate Barlow as authentic mediums grows, their tour in Paris catches the eyes of a film producer who tries to capture evidence of real paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: When Henry meets Lucy and thinks he has found the girl of his dreams, he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him everyday.(n)
